name: COVID19ICD10CMValueSetForHumanImmunodeficiencyVirusHIVInfection
title: COVID19 ICD10CM Value Set for Human Immunodeficiency Virus (HIV) Infection
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to HIV or AIDS and is listed as an immunocompromised condition on the CDC SARS-CoV-2 hospitalization surveillance case report form.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes both symptomatic and asymptomatic HIV infection. It also includes terms related to HIV complicating pregnancy, childbirth, and the puerperium.),(Exclusion Criteria: )
